definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Both servers are running with one partition only.
sentences.chinese: 這兩臺服務器都只以一個分區運行。

sentences.english: A partitioning key should include one to three columns.
sentences.chinese: 一個分區鍵應該包括一至三個列。
基於分區或磁盤映像的部署。

sentences.english: The database partition does not share any data, but communicates via messages.
sentences.chinese: 數據庫分區不會共享數據，但會通過消息進行通信。

sentences.english: The playoffs continue in this elimination scheme until a conference champion is crowned.
sentences.chinese: 這種淘汰制一直進行到決出分區的冠軍。

sentences.english: This register contains a value that indicates the partition to which the processor is assigned.
sentences.chinese: 這個寄存器包含一個說明爲該分區分配的處理器的值。

sentences.english: First, each partition has its own subset of metadata.
sentences.chinese: 首先，每個分區都有自己的元數據子集。

sentences.english: The letters SW1 stand for a postal district of London.
sentences.chinese: SW1這幾個字母代表倫敦的郵政分區。

sentences.english: The ideal situation is that partitions do not need to interact with each other at all.
sentences.chinese: 理想情況是這些分區相互之間根本不需要發生交互。

sentences.english: If you do not go back to the partitioner and increase the size of these partitions, the installation may fail.
sentences.chinese: 你是否想讓安裝程序再次嘗試卸載這些分區？

sentences.english: The winners of each section nationwide will then fight for the overall title of champions.
sentences.chinese: 國內各個分區賽的冠軍隨後將展開全國冠軍的爭奪。

sentences.english: Usually the table partitioning key will be a time-based column.
sentences.chinese: 通常表分區鍵是基於時間的列。

sentences.english: Partitioned table spaces show the greatest performance improvements for this type of parallelism.
sentences.chinese: 分區表空間最能體現這種並行所帶來的性能提高。

sentences.english: Use slice cutting on the side section by the angle of the section.
sentences.chinese: 發片與分區角度拉出以滑剪手法處理。

sentences.english: The partitioning key should include the columns that are used most often as predicates in queries.
sentences.chinese: 分區鍵應該將最常使用的列作爲謂詞包含在查詢中。

sentences.english: Zoning means the planning decisions which have been made and drawn out on maps .
sentences.chinese: 分區規劃指已經做出且已標繪在地圖上的規劃決策。

definition: to lock (a door)/to close with a latch/to lock into place/a lock/a latch/to lock a computer file (to prevent it being overwritten)/to lock (denying access to a computer system or device or files, e.g. by password-protection)/to focus attention on/to target
variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
to add to existing facilities or services
one's affiliation (i.e. the organization one is affiliated with)/subordinate (i.e. those subordinate to oneself)/belonging to/affiliated/under one's command
to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
